content:
The IM group is documenting examples for the revised MolecularSequence resource. Please contribute examples by uploading files to our shared drive: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1mPToYNIlpQ3xNiq7XoL2PIUBuZPkOyUA

Please note that the scope of MolecularSequence (revised) is the sequence only (not variation or interpretations). Sequences can be of any type (e.g., DNA, RNA, protein) and length.

Thanks!
anyone have an imputed genome? That might be a good example
